00027 #ifdef _WIN32

00034 #ifdef BOOST_XINT_DOXYGEN_IGNORE
00035     // The documentation should see a simplified version of the functions.
00036     #define BOOST_XINT_FINTEGER_INITIAL_TPL template<...>
00037     #define BOOST_XINT_FINTEGER_TPL template<...>
00038     #define BOOST_XINT_FINTEGER_TYPE fixed_integer

00040     #define BOOST_XINT_FINTEGER_INITIAL_TPL template <boost::xint::bitsize_t \
00041         Bits, class Alloc = std::allocator<detail::digit_t>, bool Threadsafe = \
00042         true, bool Secure = false>
00043     #define BOOST_XINT_FINTEGER_TPL template<boost::xint::bitsize_t Bits, \
00044         class Alloc, bool Threadsafe, bool Secure>
00045     #define BOOST_XINT_FINTEGER_TYPE fixed_integer<Bits, Alloc, Threadsafe, \
00046         Secure>
00047 #endif
00048 
00050 namespace detail {
00059 template <bitsize_t Bits, class Alloc = std::allocator<digit_t>, bool Threadsafe
00060     = true, bool Secure = false>
00061 class fixed_digitmanager_t: public digitmanager_t<Alloc, Threadsafe, Secure> {
00062     public:
00063     fixed_digitmanager_t() { }
00064     fixed_digitmanager_t(size_t requested_length, bool readonly = false):
00065         digitmanager_t<Alloc, Threadsafe, Secure>(requested_length, readonly)
00066         { }
00067     fixed_digitmanager_t(const base_digitmanager_t& copy):
00068         digitmanager_t<Alloc, Threadsafe, Secure>(copy) { }
00069 
00070     virtual base_digitmanager_t *new_of_type(base_digitmanager_t *copy = 0)
00071         const { if (copy != 0) return new fixed_digitmanager_t<Bits, Alloc,
00072         Threadsafe, Secure>(*copy); else return new fixed_digitmanager_t<Bits,
00073         Alloc, Threadsafe, Secure>; }
00074     virtual size_t fixed_length() const { return fixed; }
00075     virtual void endmod_hook(digit_t *p) { *(p + last_digit_index) &=
00076         last_digit_mask; }
00077 
00078     protected:
00079     static const size_t fixed, last_digit_index;
00080     static const digit_t last_digit_mask;
00081 };
00082 
00083 template <bitsize_t Bits, class Alloc, bool Threadsafe, bool Secure>
00084 const size_t fixed_digitmanager_t<Bits, Alloc, Threadsafe, Secure>::fixed =
00085     detail::data_t::bits_to_digits(Bits);
00086 template <bitsize_t Bits, class Alloc, bool Threadsafe, bool Secure> const
00087     size_t fixed_digitmanager_t<Bits, Alloc, Threadsafe,
00088     Secure>::last_digit_index = fixed_digitmanager_t<Bits, Alloc, Threadsafe,
00089     Secure>::fixed - 1;
00090 template <bitsize_t Bits, class Alloc, bool Threadsafe, bool Secure> const
00091     digit_t fixed_digitmanager_t<Bits, Alloc, Threadsafe,
00092     Secure>::last_digit_mask = (Bits % detail::bits_per_digit)
00093     ? digit_t((doubledigit_t(1) << (Bits % detail::bits_per_digit)) - 1)
00094     : detail::digit_mask;
00095 } // namespace detail

00137 class fixed_integer: public detail::fixed_digitmanager_t<Bits, Alloc,
00138     Threadsafe, Secure>, public any_integer
00139 {
00140     public:
00141     typedef BOOST_XINT_FINTEGER_TYPE type;
00142

00147         false);

00230     void _swap(BOOST_XINT_FINTEGER_TYPE& s) { using std::swap; swap(data,

00238 BOOST_XINT_FINTEGER_TPL
00239 BOOST_XINT_FINTEGER_TYPE::fixed_integer(): any_integer(*this, 1) {
00240     // Don't need to do anything, already preinitialized to zero.
00241 }
00242 
00244 BOOST_XINT_FINTEGER_TPL
00245 BOOST_XINT_FINTEGER_TYPE::fixed_integer(const BOOST_XINT_FINTEGER_TYPE& b, bool
00246     force_thread_safety): detail::fixed_digitmanager_t<Bits, Alloc, Threadsafe,
00247     Secure>(*b.data.holder()), any_integer(*this, (std::min)(b.data.length,
00248     BOOST_XINT_FINTEGER_TYPE::fixed), b.data.negative)
00249 {
00250     data.beginendmod();
00251     if (force_thread_safety && Threadsafe == false) data.make_unique();
00252 }

00309 BOOST_XINT_FINTEGER_TPL
00310 BOOST_XINT_FINTEGER_TYPE::fixed_integer(const any_integer& c, bool):
00311     any_integer(*this, 1)
00312 {
00313     if (c._data().is_nan()) throw exceptions::not_a_number();
00314     data.duplicate_data(c._data());
00315 }

00329 BOOST_XINT_FINTEGER_TPL
00330 template <typename Type> BOOST_XINT_FINTEGER_TYPE::fixed_integer(const Type n,
00331     typename boost::enable_if<boost::is_integral<Type> >::type*):
00332     any_integer(*this, 1)
00333 {
00334     if (std::numeric_limits<Type>::is_signed) data.set_signed(n);
00335     else data.set_unsigned(n);
00336 }

00348 BOOST_XINT_FINTEGER_TPL
00349 BOOST_XINT_FINTEGER_TYPE BOOST_XINT_FINTEGER_TYPE::operator-() const {
00350     BOOST_XINT_FINTEGER_TYPE r(-data);
00351     return BOOST_XINT_MOVE(r);

00353 
00359 BOOST_XINT_FINTEGER_TPL
00360 BOOST_XINT_FINTEGER_TYPE BOOST_XINT_FINTEGER_TYPE::operator~() const {
00361     BOOST_XINT_FINTEGER_TYPE r;
00362     r.data.beginmod(this->fixed_length(), true);
00363     const detail::digit_t *s = data.digits(), *se = s + data.length;
00364     detail::digit_t *t = r.data.digits(), *te = t + this->fixed_length();
00365     while (s != se) *t++ = ~(*s++);
00366     while (t != te) *t++ = static_cast<detail::digit_t>(~0);
00367     r.data.length = this->fixed_length();
00368     r.data.endmod();
00369     return BOOST_XINT_MOVE(r);
00370 }

00545 BOOST_XINT_FINTEGER_TPL
00546 template <class Type>
00547 BOOST_XINT_FINTEGER_TYPE BOOST_XINT_FINTEGER_TYPE::random_by_size(Type& gen,
00548     bitsize_t size_in_bits, bool high_bit_on, bool low_bit_on, bool
00549     can_be_negative)
00550 {
00551     detail::random_generator<Type> rgen(gen);
00552 
00553     BOOST_XINT_FINTEGER_TYPE r;
00554     detail::random_by_size(r._data(), rgen, size_in_bits, high_bit_on,
00555         low_bit_on, can_be_negative);
00556     return BOOST_XINT_MOVE(r);
00557 }

00563     bitsize_t size_in_bits, callback_t callback)
00564 {
00565     detail::random_generator<Type> rgen(gen);
00566 
00567     BOOST_XINT_FINTEGER_TYPE r;
00568     detail::random_prime(r._data(), rgen, size_in_bits, callback);

00872 #define BOOST_XINT_FIXED_ANY_COMPARE(rtype, op) \
00873     template <bitsize_t Bits, class Alloc, bool Threadsafe, bool Secure, typename \
00874         N> \
00875     rtype op(const BOOST_XINT_FINTEGER_TYPE n1, const N n2) { \
00876         return op(n1, BOOST_XINT_FINTEGER_TYPE(n2)); \
00877     } \
00878     \
00879     template <typename N, bitsize_t Bits, class Alloc, bool Threadsafe, bool \
00880         Secure> \
00881     rtype op(const N n1, const BOOST_XINT_FINTEGER_TYPE n2) { \
00882         return op(BOOST_XINT_FINTEGER_TYPE(n1), n2); \
00883     }

00894 #define BOOST_XINT_FIXED_ANY_MATH(op) \
00895     template <bitsize_t Bits, class Alloc, bool Threadsafe, bool Secure, typename \
00896         N> \
00897     BOOST_XINT_FINTEGER_TYPE op(const BOOST_XINT_FINTEGER_TYPE n1, const N n2) \
00898     { \
00899         BOOST_XINT_FINTEGER_TYPE r(op(n1, BOOST_XINT_FINTEGER_TYPE(n2))); \
00900         return BOOST_XINT_MOVE(r); \
00901     } \
00902     \
00903     template <typename N, bitsize_t Bits, class Alloc, bool Threadsafe, bool \
00904         Secure> \
00905     BOOST_XINT_FINTEGER_TYPE op(const N n1, const BOOST_XINT_FINTEGER_TYPE n2) \
00906     { \
00907         BOOST_XINT_FINTEGER_TYPE r(op(BOOST_XINT_FINTEGER_TYPE(n1), n2)); \
00908         return BOOST_XINT_MOVE(r); \
00909     }

00960     public:

00964         -~(boost::xint::BOOST_XINT_FINTEGER_TYPE()); }
00965     static boost::xint::BOOST_XINT_FINTEGER_TYPE max() throw() { return
00966         ~(boost::xint::BOOST_XINT_FINTEGER_TYPE()); }
00967 
00968     static const int digits = Bits;
00969     static const int digits10;
00970     static const bool is_signed = true;
00971     static const bool is_integer = true;
00972     static const bool is_exact = true;
00973     static const int radix = 2;
00974     static boost::xint::BOOST_XINT_FINTEGER_TYPE epsilon() throw() { return 0; }
00975     static boost::xint::BOOST_XINT_FINTEGER_TYPE round_error() throw() { return
00976         0; }
00977 
00978     static const int min_exponent = 0; // N/A
00979     static const int min_exponent10 = 0; // N/A
00980     static const int max_exponent = 0; // N/A
00981     static const int max_exponent10 = 0; // N/A
00982

00984     static const bool has_quiet_NaN = false;
00985     static const bool has_signaling_NaN = false;
00986     static const float_denorm_style has_denorm = denorm_absent; // N/A
00987     static const bool has_denorm_loss = false; // N/A
00988 
00989     static boost::xint::BOOST_XINT_FINTEGER_TYPE
00990         infinity() throw() { return 0; } // N/A
00991     static boost::xint::BOOST_XINT_FINTEGER_TYPE
00992         quiet_NaN() throw() { return 0; } // N/A
00993     static boost::xint::BOOST_XINT_FINTEGER_TYPE
00994         signaling_NaN() throw() { return 0; } // N/A
00995     static boost::xint::BOOST_XINT_FINTEGER_TYPE
00996         denorm_min() throw() { return 0; } // N/A
00997

01000     static const bool is_modulo = true;
01001

01003     static const bool tinyness_before = false; // N/A
01004     static const float_round_style round_style = round_indeterminate; // N/A
